content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'vbrk' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'dbo')
CREATE TABLE dbo.vbrk
	(
	 [VBELN] int,
	 [FKDAT] nvarchar(4000),
	 [FKART] nvarchar(4000),
	 [KNUMV] int,
	 [KURRF] int,
	 [BUKRS] int,
	 [KUNAG] int,
	 [BSTNK_VF] int,
	 [XBLNR] int,
	 [BUPLA] int,
	 [FKSTO] int,
	 [VKORG] int,
	 [WAERK] int,
	 [VTWEG] int,
	 [ZTERM] int,
	 [ZUONR] int,
	 [ZLSCH] int,
	 [ERDAT] nvarchar(4000)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_vbrk
--AS
--BEGIN
truncate table dbo.vbrk
COPY INTO dbo.vbrk
(VBELN 1, FKDAT 2, FKART 3, KNUMV 4, KURRF 5, BUKRS 6, KUNAG 7, BSTNK_VF 8, XBLNR 9, BUPLA 10, FKSTO 11, VKORG 12, WAERK 13, VTWEG 14, ZTERM 15, ZUONR 16, ZLSCH 17, ERDAT 18)
FROM 'https://dataexjh77rhzzkvukipoc.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/3caracoes/VBRK/*.parquet'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.vbrk
GO
